entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer: Prefer Task.FromResult over Task.Run(() => value) #67123
  • Official build sometimes fails building mono.workloads #67117
  • Suboptimal codegen for `default(SomeValueType)` #67116
  • Incorrect DateTimeFormat for nb-NO in Blazor WebAssembly #67115
  • Profiler.Tests.GCBasicTests test failure #67106
  • Potential BSOD in Libraries Test Run release coreclr windows x64 Release #67105
  • Benchmark Dotnet AOT build failing with exit 1 #67098
    7.0.0
  • SEGFAULT due to tiered compilation on 32 bit RASPBIAN .net 6.0 Builds #67102
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.WindowsServiceHelpers.IsWindowsService crashes when started as service #67093
  • Building Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions fails in VS #67091
  • [API Proposal]: Make `Type.GetTypeFromHandleUnsafe` public #67090
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Publish S.N.Quic tests and runtime in our public pipeline artifacts #67089
  • System Timer with 1 millisecond interval. #67088
  • NullReferenceException in System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper.AddOneArgTypeHelper when using ILGenerator.EmitCall on an interface method with 'in' arguments. #67084
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\regressions\\beta2\\437017\\437017.cmd #67083
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Document.Tests.Perf_EnumerateArray #67101
  • HttpClient SendAsync leaks when posting ByteArrayContent from a delegate #67096
  • Use framework provided by the SDK #67080
    7.0.0
  • MissingMethodException: The method 'System.Void System.IO.Packaging.Package::.cctor()' has no implementation. #67079
  • OSR stress failure in System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticsSource.Tests #67078
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricsTests.PassingVariableTagsParametersTest #67077
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ServerAsyncAuthenticateTest.ServerAsyncAuthenticate_EachSupportedProtocol_Success(protocol: Ssl3) #67076
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\1514\\InterlockExchange\\InterlockExchange.cmd #67074
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.Activity: Enumeration API #67072
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failure in System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTest.VerifyExpectedPaths brings down tests #67071
  • System.IO.Tests.File_Move_Tests.File_Move_Multiple_From_Watched_To_Unwatched_Mac failed #67070

Closed

  • (Should we) Provide implementations for {RSA,DSA,ECDsa}.HashData(?) #66228
    Future
  • System.Net test suites asserts in CI on ArrayBuffer.Discard #43686
    7.0.0
  • JIT Intristics for typeof(T).IsX #67113
  • Microsoft.NetCore.Targets 6.0.0 - No Stable Version #67099
  • Disabled roslyn-analyzers subscription #67068
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Authenticated ciphers should distigush between mismatched tag and failure #67082
  • Alternative option to Thread.Abort() #66943
  • ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails - fails with ObjectDisposedException #2352
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ClientAsyncAuthenticateTest.ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails(clientProtocol: Tls12, serverProtocol: Ssl3, expectedException: typeof(System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException)) #67075
  • Sync stream serialization not handling IAsyncEnumerable correctly #66687
    7.0.0
  • DeflateStream.ReadAsync disregards Memory<byte> buffer size #67092
  • System.Text.Json ReferenceHandler test failures when enabling async in tests #66727
    7.0.0
  • How to calculate percentile using System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Histogram #66592
    7.0.0
  • An exception is thrown when getting PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters #66186
  • Caching of SCHANNEL_CRED may lead to SslStream using expired certificate chain #43879
    Future
  • An error occurs when an expression is used as a parameter to a generic attribute constructor. #67085
  • [mono] instructions for running tests on windows using Mono with release/6.0 branch #63189
  • Coding Style: Using 'new()' without the type on the left-hand side #53369
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor HandleCollectionsAsync to an xunit Theory #67126
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #67125
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [perf] Set job name for the performance jobs #67124
    area-Infrastructure
  • Exclude throwinnestedtrycatch_il_r from Arm runs #67122
  • [mono][wasm] Store the exception object in a GC handle while it is be… #67121
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    community-contribution
  • Issue at most one connection attempt per request #67114
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [PERF] Added --logbuildoutput to microbenchmark runs. #67111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix error reporting for objects with unsupported property types #67109
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Make the cross-component build just another invocation of the build-runtime script #67108
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #67104
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies #67103
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.x
  • Add EvaluationResult Scheme for arrays. #67095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete unused native code in src/native #67087
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Stabilize summary blobs #67086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update fabricbot instructions #67073
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Enable localization for LibraryImportGenerator #67107
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Implement {Try}HashData on asymmetric algorithms #66349
    area-System.Security
  • Fix typo in a summary comment in SharedAttribute #67120
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • [Android] Re-enable System.Security.Cryptography tests #67057
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #66992
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Delete AssemblyBuilderData and ModuleBuilderData #66996
    area-System.Reflection
  • Delete custom cmake config cache mechanism on Unix #64370
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix entry point for EnumPrinters #67081
    area-System.Drawing
  • Fix loop cloning for OSR #67067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use stackalloc in System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NumberFormatterBase.ConvertToAlphabetic #67003
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies… #67024
    tenet-performance, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ensure Sync stream serialization is handling IAsyncEnumerable correctly #67035
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Ensure exception_message points to a string #66991
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update the latest node for markdownlint #67060
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ReferenceHandler test failures when enabling small buffer async in tests #67041
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add timestamp-based expiration to cached SafeFreeCredentials #66334
    area-System.Net.Security
  • CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Update coding-style to include target-typed new() guideline #67061
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Disable multi-level lookup by default #67022
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Fix race condition in loading assemblies with composite native images #67000
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Expose the custom type marshalling types for source-generated interop. #67052
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Replace bool[] arrays with Span<bool> in XML deserialization #66914
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Replace 2 allocations from string.ToCharArray() with ReadOnlySpan in System.Private.Xml library #67002
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67066
    area-Setup
  • [release/6.0] Fix unaligned UTF16 string read in collect tracing EventPipe command. #66828
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • Cache several char[] allocations in System.Private.Xml library methods #67001
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove mono-perfcounters.c and most of mono-counters.c #66986
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #65089
    area-Build-mono
  • Don't throw PNSE on QuicImplementationProvider.IsSupported #67036
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67030
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.7 #67006
    area-Build-mono
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Console logging doesn't work unless there's a delay #24544
  • THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT needed for SDK repo? #24542
    Discussion
  • Mark the SDK in VS previews as preview in the installer UI #24534
  • Consider publishing the BuiltInTemplatePackageProvider and OptionalWorkloadProvider (and related types) to NuGet #24532
  • Ability to view System.Diagnostics.Process memory usage and cpu time after exit #24531

Closed

  • Workloads should be able to control the relative import order of .props and .targets #22358
    6.0.4xx
  • Form designer keep loading when targeting to .NET 7.0 #24389

PullRequests

Created

  • Workload feature band fallback with rollback files #24545
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove 'reflecting any global.json' from info label #24541
    Area-CLI
  • Revert #23358 #24538

Merged

  • Make enabling C++/CLI activation feature also enable native hosting #24540
    Area-ILLink
  • Detect arm64 hostfxr.dll #24512
    Area-Workloads
  • Change LastIndexOf to use invariant culture #24518
    Area-NetSDK
  • Hide manifest updates during workload install #24451
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1681056 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make the net6 warning when running in 16.11 say or higher #24431
  • Port the prep machine change and the helix update to VS 2022 #24412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Renable the test based on feedback. #24447

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .editorconfig not working or respected by Visual Studio! #60377
  • Avoid checking array/stackalloc creation sync in NullableWalker #60376
  • csharpcodedefinitionwindow.codedefinitionwindowopensmetadataassource failing #60364
  • csharpcodedefinitionwindow.codedefinitionwindowopensmetadataassource failing #60363
  • Improve pointer dereference message clarity #60362
    Backlog
  • `[SuppressMessage]` should be able to suppress `dotnet_style_namespace_match_folder` warnings #60361
  • Non-public classes are visible while non-public methods aren't? #60360
  • Unable to evaluate local functions #60358

Closed

  • Speculating with `nameof` doesn't produce a `NameOfBinder` leading to incorrect results #60337
    17.2
  • C# interpolated raw strings cause FormatExceptions in .NET 5 and earlier #60374
    17.2
  • Unnecessary cast diagnostic sometimes missing in top level programs #60248
  • [New rule] Notify that foreach may throw InvalidCastException #54712
  • Intellisense not auto complete when writing code continously without enter #57646
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add formatter and smart indentation tests for checked operators #60375
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60373
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update breaking change document and compiler test plan for UTF8 String Literals #60372
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Pause taggers when they are not visible. #60371
    Area-IDE
  • Don't offer to use patterns when they won't work #60370
    Area-IDE
  • Increase delay for getting compilation-available notifications from OOP #60369
    Area-IDE
  • Delay async taggers and navbars for files that are not visible #60367
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a race condition in IDE diagnostic service for stale diagnostics #60365
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • [LSP] Remove the majority of usages of client name. #60357
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #60356
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Follow up on Test Plan Review and PROTOTYPE comments for UTF8 String Literals feature. #60349
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Create solution on the main thread in integration tests #58873
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Create solution on the main thread in integration tests #60366
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #60368
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Add EE tests for UTF8 String Literals. #60352
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Adjust DefiniteAssignmentPass.WriteConsideredUse for UTF8 String Literals. #60326
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Fix top-level speculation #60274
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Avoid resizing array builder while get unaliased references #60220
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60314
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Suppress nullable property/field initialization warning for required members #60243
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitStackAllocArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting initializer #60210
    Area-Compilers
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Do not run CI for non code files #60327
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extend scope of type parameters in attributes #40525
    Area-Compilers, C# 11.0
  • Don't complete quotes if they complete a valid string #60227
    Area-IDE
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Respect C# naming conventions when generating parameter for record #60338
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Move more package initialization to BG. #60211
    Area-IDE
  • Use synthesized methods for compiler-generated switch exceptions #59975
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Initial support for variable declarations under disjunctive patterns #59702
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix SymbolDisplay.FormatPrimitive #60346
    Area-Compilers
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove .git-blame-ignore-revs to avoid inaccurate blame on github #60350
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider removing out-of-proc hosting model for IIS in 7.0 #40863
  • Updating Blazor Server app in IIS causes exception when calling ProtectedLocalStorage #40862
  • 2FA sign in only returns locked out after n+1 failed attempts #40860
  • Razor Component weird namespace issue #40861
  • Response content type in custom exception middleware - serialization for Json and XML #40857
  • Add a `CreatedAtRoute` result for multiple routes #40856
    Backlog
  • Blazor WASM: Blazor.start() promise does not resolve on certain errors #40855
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server - Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: } exception #40854

Closed

  • File nesting: include rules in NuGet packages or as project items #40652
  • Blazor - Error Boundary not triggered inside of EditForm Component #40649
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Dependency] Bump version support for Swashbuckle in templates #40778
  • Blazor - Ambiguous/Duplicate routes for _Host when updating Razor.RuntimeCompilation package to v6.0.3 #40742
  • Hot reload doesn't work on F5 but works when run `dotnet watch` #40502
  • Blazor Server: hang when circuit disconnects #40814
    6.0.x
  • [Question] How does ProducesResponseType inference work for ActionResult<T>? #38108
    Discussions
  • Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Could not find 'blazorExtensions.WriteCookie' ('blazorExtensions' was undefined). #40744
  • Passing tab character to API returns bad request #40495
  • .net 7 is on ubuntu 21.10 and libmsquic on 20.04 http3 #40679

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't use yarn.msbuild SDK in source-build #40864
    area-blazor
  • [6.0] Allow leading CR/LF in HTTP request lines in Kestrel #40859
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK, Unquarantine tests #40858
    area-infrastructure
  • Included githubactions in dependabot config #40851
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Forward Port Update MAUI Exception Handling (#40765) to `main` #40842
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump minimist from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 in /src/ProjectTemplates/test #40850
    area-mvc, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump minimist from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 in /src/ProjectTemplates/BlazorTemplates.Tests #40849
    area-mvc, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Allow leading CR/LF in HTTP request lines in Kestrel #40833
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Declare readonly members for mutable structs #39637
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump minimist from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 in /src/Components/test/E2ETest #40848
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump minimist from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 in /src/Components/Web.JS #40847
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Issue/31962 #40841
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #39685
    area-security
  • [release/6.0] Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40840
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task (#40198) #40533
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Prevent razor pages from being packed in UI nupkg #40839
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst Dev Tools not Supported #5561
  • Update Picker modal using DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfoChanged. #5557

  • template for maui blazor preview #5543

    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Some Essentials APIs crash when using multi-window #5536
    6.0.300

Closed

  • RadioButton - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5502
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Controls aligned to right are cropped on Android #5214
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Blazor Hot Reload is not fully working #3973
    6.0.300
  • Microsoft.UI.Xaml does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft' #4931

  • Dotnet-podcasts app fails to build for iOS #5400
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] App crashes when start from background #4169
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • CarouselPage Migration #5526
  • Html from Local File in Windows #5523
  • Toolbar Icons missing on Windows #5452
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • XamlC should compile RowDefinition and ColumnDefinition CollectionTypeConverters #5430
  • [Templates] No ResourceDictionary template #4534
  • [Android]Clip property is not working properly in preview 12 #4285
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Android: Elements are clipped incorrectly if Element.Clip is set to EllipseGeometry #3843
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting Android from VS (Windows) #4919
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting WinUI #4926
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • A CarouselPage so that we can swipe between different Pages without using templates. #4606
  • [Bug] ImageButtons Aspect behave diferent depending on platform #3272
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • RCL Hybrid App _component dosnt load on windows/android platform #5392
    6.0.300-rc.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix more text alignment issues #5563
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Modernize Essentials Namespaces #5562
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Update global.json to use `6.0.300-preview` #5560

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT needed for efcore repo? #27699
  • ToQueryString parameter values with float (and maybe real?) are wrong #27697
  • Concat different derived entities using OfType (TPH) throws exception #27695
  • BenchmarkDotNet - EF6 performs better than EF Core for ToList() #27694
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite low query performance #27693

Closed

  • EFCore will not populate `Id` after save when the collection is not of concrete type #27698

PullRequests

Created

  • Reimplement MaxBatchSize as a pre-check #27696

Updated

  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • multiple build warnings: Consider app.config remapping of assembly #13465

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #13461

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #13457
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13454

Updated

  • Add leak detection #13434
  • Build aspnetcore project templates in source-build #13459
  • unset shell variables in single statement #13436
